data.title: Torrent Power Limited
data.meta_description:
Torrent Cables Limited has become Torrent Power Limited with effect from 1st October, 2015.

The ISO 9001:2008, ISO 14001:2004, OHSAS 18001:2007 accredited Torrent Cables (Unit of Torrent Power Limited) is winning against all odds. It was acquired from Mahindra Electricals Ltd in 1989.

Today Torrent Cables is the market leader in HT XLPE power cables and is one of the fastest growing cable companies in India. Torrent Cables has a completely integrated manufacturing facility located at Nadiad about 40 kms from Ahmedabad. Torrent Cables manufactures large varieties of cables upto 132kv, which include XLPE insulated cables, Corrugated Cables; Elastomer insulated cables and PVC insulated cables.

Torrent Cables has the most stringent in house Quality Assurance and Quality Control System. Torrent Cables products meet Indian, British and other International standards. They are regularly tested at reputed independent test laboratories like Central Power Research Institute – Bangalore; National House – Mumbai; Electrical Research Development Association – Baroda. Torrent Cables also manufactures cables to suit a client’s specific needs. It was the first company in the cable industry to get ISO 9001:2000 certifications.
data.text:
Information

Torrent Cables Limited has become Torrent Power Limited with effect from 1st October, 2015. The ISO 9001:2008, ISO 14001:2004, OHSAS 18001:2007 accredited Torrent Cables (Unit of Torrent Power Limited) is winning against all odds. It was acquired from Mahindra Electricals Ltd in 1989. Today Torrent Cables is the market leader in HT XLPE power cables and is one of the fastest growing cable companies in India. Torrent Cables has a completely integrated manufacturing facility located at Nadiad about 40 kms from Ahmedabad. Torrent Cables manufactures large varieties of cables upto 132kv, which include XLPE insulated cables, Corrugated Cables; Elastomer insulated cables and PVC insulated cables. Torrent Cables has the most stringent in house Quality Assurance and Quality Control System. Torrent Cables products meet Indian, British and other International standards. They are regularly tested at reputed independent test laboratories like Central Power Research Institute – Bangalore; National House – Mumbai; Electrical Research Development Association – Baroda. Torrent Cables also manufactures cables to suit a client’s specific needs. It was the first company in the cable industry to get ISO 9001:2000 certifications.
